testcase.name: Create a booking
testcase.system-out:

@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Getting details of a booking
testcase.system-out:

@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Update a booking
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Update a booking Given I have a valid token ... passed in 0.000s Given I have a valid booking ID ... passed in 0.000s And I have new booking details ... passed in 0.001s When I update the booking ... passed in 0.614s Then I should see the updated booking information ... passed in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Delete a booking
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Delete a booking Given I have a valid token ... passed in 0.000s Given I have a valid booking ID ... passed in 0.001s When I delete the booking ... passed in 0.522s Then the booking should be deleted successfully ... passed in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Trying to create a booking with invalid data
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Trying to create a booking with invalid data Given I have invalid booking details ... passed in 0.000s When I try to create a booking ... passed in 0.558s Then I should receive a validation error ... passed in 0.002s
